channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Convicted felon accused of leading state police on chase on Route 28 sentenced to prison

item.title: Democrats hammer Trump for his weekend of golf as stocks tumble
item.description: Dow futures opened Sunday evening down 1,500 points, or 4% percent., while the S&P 500 and NASDAQ 100 futures were also down 4%.

item.title: War's toll on Gaza's children

item.title: Trump tariffs live updates: Trump addresses stock market losses, China trade deficit
item.description: Trump's universal 10% levy against all countries went into effect early Saturday.

item.title: Speaker Johnson cuts deal with Rep. Luna over parental proxy voting
item.description: Speaker Mike Johnson and Florida GOP Rep. Anna Paulina Luna say they have cut a deal to end the fight over proxy voting for new parents.

item.title: Booker: Biggest mistake Democratic Party has made is ‘not centering people enough’
item.description: The biggest mistake Democrats have made is “not centering people enough” Sen. Cory Booker, D-N.J., said Sunday on ABC News' "This Week."

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Bondi says Trump will 'probably' leave after second term
item.description: The administration's FEMA funding freeze violated a court order, a judge ruled.
